unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for securing fresh talent. This year, IIT Delhi witnessed record placements. Dr. Sharma's initiative to target Tier-2 colleges in UP like BITS Pilani is commendable. Salary packages averaging Rs. 8 lakhs show competitive offers. The new office expansion provides 5000 sq ft dedicated to onboarding. Companies from Bangalore to Chennai are actively participating. We need to ensure diverse representation. Let’s build the next generation of leaders.
normalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for securing fresh talent. This year, I I T Delhi witnessed record placements. Doctor Sharma's initiative to target Tier two colleges in U P like B I T S Pilani is commendable. Salary packages averaging rupee eight lakhs show competitive offers.
